metadata.name: Job Summary
metadata.value:
Our team is seeking a Data Scientist Lead who is highly motivated to take full ownership of the data science function, serving as the subject matter expert and strategic driver for the entire organization. You will define the long-term data science strategy and elevate our approach to modeling and experimentation. 

Notably, this position is focused on technical leadership. You'll work closely with a cross-functional team, including Business Intelligence Analysts, Data Engineers, Software Engineers and the Director of Engineering. Project direction will be provided by our Product Integration Team, who are first-party members of client teams. Your main goal is to leverage your expertise to create production-ready models and strengthen decision-making across all teams to help achieve our goals of safeguarding our clientsâ€™ reputations through their digital assets.
